bibl.title: Letter from Leandro M. Tocantins to Philip Showalter Hench, March 31, 1953

div1.p: Tocantins is sending Hench reprints of a paper concerning Finlay and their visit to Cuba. He is appreciative of Hench's help.

div1.head: Letter from Leandro M. Tocantins to Philip Showalter Hench, March 31, 1953
div1.opener:
THE JEFFERSON MEDICAL COLLEGE OF PHILADELPHIA
1025 WALNUT STREET
March 31, 1953.
DEPARTMENT OF MEDICINE
Dr. Philip S. Hench,
Mayo Clinic,
Rochester, Minnesota.
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
Enclosed are a few reprints of the paper dealing with
Carlos Finlay and our visit to Cuba. Let me renew my appreciation
for the help that you and Dr. Nogueira gave us during our visit.
div1.closer: Sincerely, L. M. Tocantins, M.D. LMT/mcf
